StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetGEOStatesIntl]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
--SELECT DISTINCT -- GL.STATE_CODE, C.COUNTRY_DESCRITION --FROM -- GEO_LOCATION GL INNER JOIN COUNTRY C ON -- (GL.STATE_CODE = C.COUNTRY_CODE AND -- ((ISNUMERIC(GL.STATE_CODE) = 1 AND GL.STATE_CODE > 56) OR -- ISNUMERIC(GL.STATE_CODE) = 0)) --ORDER BY -- C.COUNTRY_DESCRITION
SELECT DISTINCT STATE_CODE, COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION FROM GEO_LOCATION WHERE ((ISNUMERIC(STATE_CODE) = 1 AND STATE_CODE > 56) OR ISNUMERIC(STATE_CODE) = 0) AND COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL ORDER BY COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION
